T02D1342:350b-3: rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba /
T02D1342:350b-4: rang snang rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1342:350b-5: gsum gsal thugs rje rig pa'i dpal //
T02D1342:350b-6: sku gsum rig pa nyid ldan la //
T02D1342:350b-8: thugs rje byin rlabs rna brgyud la //
T02D1342:350b-9: 'phags pa'i gsung dang byin rlabs kyis //
T02D1342:350b-10: rang snang nyi ma lta bur gsal //
T02D1342:350b-11: gsal byed rin chen snang ba 'di //
T02D1342:350b-12: mtha' yas 'gro ba thams cad la //
T02D1342:350b-13: dbyer med tshul du ldan gyis kyang //
T02D1342:350b-14: bdag 'dzin log pa'i sems kyis dkrugs //
T02D1342:350b-15: sa 'og bum pa ji bzhin pas //
T02D1342:350b-18: 'gro ba mun pa la gnas nas //
T02D1342:350b-19: mas pa'i rnal 'byor mig med la //
T02D1342:350b-20: snying po 'od kyi don du bshad //
T02D1342:350b-21: gting ltar mi gsal rin po che //
T02D1342:351a-1: med mthong ba'i lam rtogs dang //
T02D1342:351a-2: bgrod med 'bras bu rang snang yin //
T02D1342:351a-4: bde gshegs gsum gyi sku ldan pa //
T02D1342:351a-5: rnam grol 'bras bu rang gzhag yin //
T02D1342:351a-6: gzhi nas ma g-yos rang bzhin 'grub //
T02D1342:351a-7: chos nyid sku la 'gyur ba med //
T02D1342:351a-8: rang rig bde ba chen po nyid //
T02D1342:351a-9: rgyu la mi gnas mthar thug pa //
T02D1342:351a-10: theg chen rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu yin //
T02D1342:351a-11: rin chen gsung gis shes 'gyur te //
T02D1342:351a-12: bsam med brjod bya snying po'i don //
T02D1342:351a-13: kun gyi brjod pa sems kyi dbyings //
T02D1342:351a-14: rang rang mos pa'i shes pa rtogs //
T02D1342:351a-15: lam gyi rtsol bas 'bras bu tshol //
T02D1342:351a-16: rang mos bsam pa'i sa la gnas //
T02D1342:351a-17: sman pa'i 'dod pas re ba 'jog / snying po lam la 'dod pa bral //
T02D1342:351a-18: yid la mi byed rang bzhin gnas //
T02D1342:351a-19: rig pa'i gzer gyis 'da' ba med //
T02D1342:351a-20: sgom pa med la bya ba bral //
T02D1342:351a-21: lta ba med pa'i snying po ni //
T02D1342:351a-22: rang gzhag sems kyi rig pas shes //
T02D1342:351a-23: char yang dang ni thig le tshul //
T02D1342:351a-24: tshul tsam mchog dang gzhan mchog don //
T02D1342:351a-25: shes rab gsang bas na ro la //
T02D1342:351a-26: snyan khung brgyud pa bzhi yi gnas //
T02D1342:351a-27: rdo rje bka' ni rtogs pa'i lam //
T02D1342:351a-28: byed pa'i sgra la gnyer ba'i sems //
T02D1342:351a-29: tshul bzang rtsol la gang gnas pa //
T02D1342:351a-30: byed pa'i don dang phrad gyur nas //
T02D1342:351a-31: bya ba'i rang bzhin shes par bya //
T02D1342:351a-32: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa rig pa nyid //
T02D1342:351a-33: gsum gyi byed pa'i 'od kyis mthong //
T02D1342:351a-34: gsum gyi 'od gsal gzhi yi lam //
T02D1342:351a-35: byed dang bral ba nyid la gnas //
T02D1342:351a-36: lam gyis lam gyi 'bras bu mthong //
T02D1342:351a-37: 'bras bu dgongs pa rgyal ba'i thugs //
T02D1342:351a-38: bsam med rang gzhag rig pa'i dang //
T02D1342:351a-39: bde chen mi rtog rgyu ba bral //
T02D1342:351a-40: yid la mi byed snang ba dag / rim pa ma 'gags ye shes gsal //
T02D1342:351a-41: dbang po padma rgyas pa'i sems //
T02D1342:351a-42: 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas //
T02D1342:351a-43: mthong ba log pa gzhan yod kyang //
T02D1342:351a-44: sprul sku dang po gzhan las min //
T02D1342:351a-45: kun bzang rgyal ba'i dgongs pa nyid //
T02D1342:351a-46: snang ba'i dus ma bzung byas la //
T02D1342:351a-47: dran pa'i tshul gyis nyams su blangs //
T02D1342:351a-49: rin chen gsung gis brtags pa las //
T02D1342:351a-50: thabs kyi bye brag shes 'gyur na //
T02D1342:351a-51: thog ma padma ji bzhin no //
T02D1342:351b-1: de ldan rgyal ba'i gral du gnas //
T02D1342:351b-2: thugs rjes kun ldan rnyog pas bslad //
T02D1342:351b-3: dangs ma dus gsum 'gyur ba med //
T02D1342:351b-4: gsang ba'i padma sngags kyi sems //
T02D1342:351b-5: spyod pa bral ba'i dus na shes //
T02D1342:351b-6: btang gzhag rang bzhin ma tsha bral //
T02D1342:351b-7: 'khor ba rnam par mi sems te //
T02D1342:351b-8: mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu ba bral //
T02D1342:351b-9: rdzogs pa'i dgongs pa bya ba med //
T02D1342:351b-10: dus gsum ma yengs srog tu sems //
T02D1342:351b-11: blang dor mi mnga' lta ba med //
T02D1342:351b-12: rang bzhin rgyal ba'i lta ba yin //
T02D1342:351b-13: mi rtsol dbu ma dang po lam //
T02D1342:351b-14: gang gis ma bcos thugs kyi lam //
T02D1342:351b-17: chags pa la sogs nyon mongs lnga //
T02D1342:351b-18: mthar thug tha ma dus na mthong //
T02D1342:351b-19: gang skyes dus na yul mi dpyad //
T02D1342:351b-20: mi 'gag ngo bo nyid la gzhag / gsang ba'i padma chos kyi sku //
T02D1342:351b-21: ma bcos rang gsal gzung 'dzin bral //
T02D1342:351b-22: rdzogs pa'i longs spyod bde ba'i sku //
T02D1342:351b-23: sprul sku gang la ngos gzung med //
T02D1342:351b-24: dbyer med rig pa gcig la gnas //
T02D1342:351b-25: 'dzin dang bral ba'i mngon sum pa //
T02D1342:351b-26: chags dang bral ba'i bde ba che //
T02D1342:351b-27: tha snyad bral ba'i thabs kyis mtshon //
T02D1342:351b-28: rtsod dang bral ba'i spyod pas blang //
T02D1342:351b-29: spro bsdu med pa'i dgongs par gnas //
T02D1342:351b-30: snang ba rgya mtsho chen po bzhin //
T02D1342:351b-31: rang bzhin rig pa de bzhin no //
T02D1342:351b-32: yon tan sna tshogs nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D1342:351b-33: dus gsum 'gyur med kun du bzang //
T02D1342:351b-34: sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med //
T02D1342:351b-35: 'khor ba nyid na rang bzhin dag / rin chen dag pa ji bzhin no //
T02D1342:351b-36: ji ltar bcos kyang 'gyur ba med //
T02D1342:351b-37: rang bzhin chos nyid ngo bo la //
T02D1342:351b-38: sgro skur spros pa dang gis med //
T02D1342:351b-39: 'dzin pa'i spyod pa log pas bslad //
T02D1342:351b-40: rang 'byung rig pa'i don ma rtogs //
T02D1342:351b-41: rang 'byung kun mkhyen rig pa'i thugs //
T02D1342:351b-43: mkha' 'dra ye shes lhun gyis grub //
T02D1342:351b-44: sgrub med dngos grub chen po la //
T02D1342:351b-45: bsrung med dam tshig rang gzhag ste //
T02D1342:351b-46: mtha' med dbus med rig par gsal //
T02D1342:351b-47: rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bo la //
T02D1342:351b-48: sems can kun gyi rang bzhin yin //
T02D1342:351b-49: ye shes rig pa rtogs gyur nas //
T02D1342:351b-50: thugs rje mdzad pa'i lam yang ston //
T02D1342:352a-2: 'dod pa'i rtsol bas sgrub mi byed //
T02D1342:352a-3: byang chub sems kyi lam chen ni //
T02D1342:352a-4: rnam dag ye shes dgongs pa'i lam //
T02D1342:352a-5: thun mong 'gro ba yongs la gnas //
T02D1342:352a-6: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byung ba //
T02D1342:352a-7: bgrod med rang rig ye shes lam //
T02D1342:352a-8: rang 'dod bltas pas grub pa med //
T02D1342:352a-9: rdzogs pa'i lam la gang gnas pa //
T02D1342:352a-10: bsam gyis mi khyab rang gzhag la //
T02D1342:352a-11: yid la mi byed yengs pa med //
T02D1342:352a-12: rnal 'byor rdzogs pa bcos med la //
T02D1342:352a-13: 'dod rtsol thig le spro bsdu med //
T02D1342:352a-14: ye nas rdzogs pa'i rnam dag la //
T02D1342:352a-15: bsam gtan yan lag kun dang ldan //
T02D1342:352a-16: rlung gi 'jug pa rang bzhin zhi //
T02D1342:352a-17: ye shes brtsal med bde ba la //
T02D1342:352a-18: dga' ba bzhi yi bde ba gnas //
T02D1342:352a-19: gang spyod thabs la ma brten yang //
T02D1342:352a-20: rin chen snang ba'i thabs kyis shes //
T02D1342:352a-21: brnga sprod tshig la gnas 'gyur yang //
T02D1342:352a-22: thig le rang byung nyid la 'chang //
T02D1342:352a-23: rtog dpyod yan lag the tshom bral //
T02D1342:352a-24: sems kyi dga' bde rtsol ba med //
T02D1342:352a-25: gnas pa rtse gcig yengs pa med //
T02D1342:352a-26: bde ba mtshan nyid chos skur gnas //
T02D1342:352a-27: ye shes gsang ba thabs chen gyis //
T02D1342:352a-28: sems kyi bag chags thabs chen gyi //
T02D1342:352a-29: gyur pa gsum la de bzhin 'gyur //
T02D1342:352a-30: sems kyi ye shes gter kha dbye //
T02D1342:352a-32: rgyu med rig pa gdod nas gnas //
T02D1342:352a-33: ye shes rang gnas bde ba che //
T02D1342:352a-34: kun mkhyen me long lta bu nyid //
T02D1342:352a-35: ma lus snang ba'i rang bzhin dag / sems kyi chos nyid bde ba shes //
T02D1342:352a-36: kun bzang nyams cig cir ma mthong //
T02D1342:352a-37: mthong med gsal ba'i me long nyid //
T02D1342:352a-38: dngos po med pa'i rig pa yin //
T02D1342:352a-40: bdag gam gzhan nam de nyid gang //
T02D1342:352a-41: grub bam ma grub ji ltar bskyed //
T02D1342:352a-42: de ltar grub na thug pa med //
T02D1342:352a-43: de ltar min na gang zhig ni //
T02D1342:352a-44: gnyis ka de med ri bong rva //
T02D1342:352a-45: gang gzhan rgyu las grub pa ni //
T02D1342:352a-46: gcig dang du ma gang du 'grub //
T02D1342:352a-48: yang dag ye shes brdzun nam ci //
T02D1342:352a-49: de ltar bdag lta log pa bzhin //
T02D1342:352a-50: spang bya nyid 'gyur yang dag man //
T02D1342:352a-51: mi mthun gnas pa'i chos yin na //
T02D1342:352a-52: zhen pa nyid 'gyur de nyid rig / de lta min na gang zhig 'thad //
T02D1342:352b-0: bskyed pa'i rim pa gang @352b gnas bar //
T02D1342:352b-1: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gang 'jug pa //
T02D1342:352b-2: gang gis gang zhig ji ltar gnas //
T02D1342:352b-3: rtsol ba'i bskyed pa de nyid dam //
T02D1342:352b-4: ye shes rig pa'i don la 'jug / de nyid yin na de lta mod //
T02D1342:352b-5: de lta min na gang zhig 'thad //
T02D1342:352b-6: thams cad thams cad grub pa'am //
T02D1342:352b-7: ma yin de la 'thad pa gang //
T02D1342:352b-8: rjes mthun rgyu yis mi gnas na //
T02D1342:352b-9: de bzhin rjes mthun nyid du 'gyur //
T02D1342:352b-10: des na seng ge phru gu bzhin //
T02D1342:352b-11: sku gsum lhun grub bde ba'i lam //
T02D1342:352b-12: rtsol ba'i 'bras bu mthar phyung nas //
T02D1342:352b-13: 'jig rten chos la'ang de bzhin no //
T02D1342:352b-14: sbyang bya 'bras bu yin pa na //
T02D1342:352b-15: khyod la dag pa'i ye shes gang //
T02D1342:352b-16: de lta nyid na rtag par 'gyur //
T02D1342:352b-17: des na rang 'byung rdzogs pa'i lam //
T02D1342:352b-18: rgyu la mi gnas rtsol ba med //
T02D1342:352b-19: rang gnas ye shes gdod nas grub //
T02D1342:352b-20: grub pa'i rang bzhin bskyed mi dgos //
T02D1342:352b-21: ye gsal nam mkha'i rang bzhin pas //
T02D1342:352b-22: gsal byed rnam pa ji bzhin no //
T02D1342:352b-24: dbyings kyi 'bras bu bsam mi khyab //
T02D1342:352b-26: che ba'i sku gsum mu mtha' med //
T02D1342:352b-27: ye shes rig pa thug phrad du //
T02D1342:352b-28: rin chen snang bas gzhag par bya //
T02D1342:352b-29: brjod bral rig pa thog babs nyid //
T02D1342:352b-30: ma brtsal rang 'byung bde ba nyid //
T02D1342:352b-31: yi ge med pa'i gsum mchog ste //
T02D1342:352b-32: kun bzang rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ston //
T02D1342:352b-33: mi rtog don mjal goms shing rtogs //
T02D1342:352b-34: yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung //
T02D1342:352b-35: don gyi chos nyid mjal bar ston //
T02D1342:352b-36: gsang sngags gter gyi mdzad 'dzin cing //
T02D1342:352b-37: rgyal ba'i grag sngags tha snyad bral //
T02D1342:352b-38: sngags tshig bral ba'i nus mthu ldan //
T02D1342:352b-39: las gzhi med pa'i don gyis 'grub //
T02D1342:352b-40: rgyu med 'bras bu mthar thug yin //
T02D1342:352b-42: zhen med tshul gyis 'jug na bde //
T02D1342:352b-43: dang po rang sems tshul la brtag / rig pa bla ma'i gdams pa bzhin //
T02D1342:352b-44: drong dang ldan na brda don sprad //
T02D1342:352b-45: dkyil 'khor drug gi ye shes la //
T02D1342:352b-46: sgra yis mtha' la gzhag par bya //
T02D1342:352b-47: myong ba med pa'i rnam pa yin //
T02D1342:352b-48: tshor ba bral ba'i reg byas go //
T02D1342:352b-49: phyi rol tshul bzhin nges par 'gyur //
T02D1342:352b-50: tha mar dran bsams rgyu ba bral //
T02D1342:352b-51: dpa' rtul za byed sems lta bu //
T02D1342:352b-52: shes pa dang bzhag ma brtul ba //
T02D1342:353a-2: ye shes rol pa mi 'gag pas //
T02D1342:353a-3: rtsol med ye shes rig pa'i dang //
T02D1342:353a-4: des na rang bzhin cog 'jog go //
T02D1342:353a-5: dngos po ji ltar snang ba yang //
T02D1342:353a-6: rang gi shes pa nyid du mthong //
T02D1342:353a-7: dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i //
T02D1342:353a-8: thugs la 'jog pa'i man ngag bcud //
T02D1342:353a-9: rin chen shar bas rang la rdzogs //
T02D1342:353a-10: rtsol bral rig pa mi rtog pa //
T02D1342:353a-11: ma bcos rang snang bde ba'i klong //
T02D1342:353a-12: ye shes lhun grub klong du shar //
T02D1342:353a-13: rang 'byung nam mkha' lta bur khyab //
T02D1342:353a-14: rang gsal rig pa'i dang la gnas //
T02D1342:353a-15: spros bral ye shes thig le che //
T02D1342:353a-16: rnam rtog bral ba'i rig pa gsal //
T02D1342:353a-17: rang gi cir yang mi rtog pa //
T02D1342:353a-18: ye shes rang gnas sems su gsal //
T02D1342:353a-19: ci yang mi rtog sems su smin //
T02D1342:353a-20: ci yang ma yin dmigs su med //
T02D1342:353a-21: rnam rtog sems kyi rgyu ba bral //
T02D1342:353a-22: rig pa'i ye shes 'dzin pa bral //
T02D1342:353a-23: rang snang rol pa byang chub sems //
T02D1342:353a-24: sgyu ma'i ye shes bde ba'i klong //
T02D1342:353a-25: rang rig ye shes 'dzin pa yin //
T02D1342:353a-26: rang 'byung sgyu mar mngon sum gsal //
T02D1342:353a-27: lhun grub ye shes ma bcos pa //
T02D1342:353a-28: bde ba'i sgyu ma rang rig nyid //
T02D1342:353a-29: thams cad ye shes sems su 'char //
T02D1342:353a-30: rig pa'i ye shes don gsal ba //
T02D1342:353a-31: thams cad ye shes nyid du mthong //
T02D1342:353a-32: ye shes ma yin gang yang med //
T02D1342:353a-33: khams gsum dangs ma ye shes nyid //
T02D1342:353a-34: ye shes rig pa'i thabs kyis shes //
T02D1342:353a-35: 'khrul pa'i sa gnas brda bkrol te //
T02D1342:353a-36: ye shes rgyal ba'i gral du gzhag / ma bcos sku gsung thugs su gnas //
T02D1342:353a-37: rang rig sems kyi 'bar ba nyid //
T02D1342:353a-38: ye shes sems kyi phur pa thebs //
T02D1342:353a-39: rnam rtog bzhon pa rlung dang bral //
T02D1342:353a-40: dngos grub bde ba'i rang byung nyid //
T02D1342:353a-41: thar pa'i lam mchog byang chub sems //
T02D1342:353a-42: 'bras bu mthar phyin rig pa nyid //
T02D1342:353a-43: rang byung sems kyi ji bzhin la //
T02D1342:353a-44: rnam pa'i rig pa thabs kyis gnas //
T02D1342:353a-45: bcos med dgongs pa bde chen 'di //
T02D1342:353a-46: mngon sum mthong la ngos gzung med //
T02D1342:353a-47: rang shar dngos por grub pa med //
T02D1342:353a-48: bde chen rig pa ma mthong ste //
T02D1342:353a-49: 'di dang bral na rtog pa nyid //
T02D1342:353a-50: bka' yi dam dang de mi ldan //
T02D1342:353a-51: dmus long mdun du gzugs snang bzhin //
T02D1342:353b-0: 'bras bu mthar phyin yod @353b ma yin //
T02D1342:353b-1: kun bzang rgyal ba'i don dang 'gal //
T02D1342:353b-2: rang gsal dgongs pa'i thugs ma rig /'dzin pa'i cha la gang gnas kyang //
T02D1342:353b-4: rang 'dod don gyi mthar ma phyin //
T02D1342:353b-5: ye shes gsang ba bde ba'i sa //
T02D1342:353b-7: 'dod med rang bzhin nyid las byung //
T02D1342:353b-8: shes pa rang lugs so ma nyid //
T02D1342:353b-9: kun bzang rgyal ba'i dgongs pa'o //
T02D1342:353b-10: tha mal shes pa 'di nyid la //
T02D1342:353b-11: bsams pa'i sems med rang gzhag yin //
T02D1342:353b-12: nges pa'i gzhi ni don la gnas //
T02D1342:353b-13: yid ches bla ma nyid la gus //
T02D1342:353b-14: rin chen gdams ngag gter du 'chang //
T02D1342:353b-15: lung gi dgongs pa'i don gsal te //
T02D1342:353b-16: rig pa rang gsal gtan la phebs //
T02D1342:353b-18: ston pa rang rig nyid yin pas //
T02D1342:353b-19: drang ba'i don la sems mi 'jug / phyi rol 'dod rtsol sems dang bral //
T02D1342:353b-20: rdzogs pa'i bka' la yid mi 'gyur //
T02D1342:353b-21: bla ma rin chen srog tu 'dzin //
T02D1342:353b-22: mos pa rang gi 'dod pa gtong //
T02D1342:353b-23: rin chen gter gyi ngo bo 'di //
T02D1342:353b-24: srog dang bral ba'i kha bzhin bsdam //
T02D1342:353b-25: rang sems byang chub sems 'di la //
T02D1342:353b-26: ye shes ma rig tha dad med //
T02D1342:353b-27: 'khrul dang ma 'khrul rig par gcig / zhen rtog brtags pa sna tshogs dang //
T02D1342:353b-28: ye shes 'od gsal ngo bo nyid //
T02D1342:353b-29: 'od gsal rang 'byung sems su gcig / byang chub sems la ngo bo bral //
T02D1342:353b-30: don ldan ye shes nyid du mthong //
T02D1342:353b-31: bsam pas brtags pa sna tshogs pa //
T02D1342:353b-32: bag chags log pa'i rkyen gyis mthong //
T02D1342:353b-33: rang rig ye shes 'jug pa dang //
T02D1342:353b-34: rtog pa'i bag chags dang po ni //
T02D1342:353b-35: sgrib pa ma lus bzhin grub cing //
T02D1342:353b-36: byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid la //
T02D1342:353b-37: thog ma dang bral tha ma med //
T02D1342:353b-39: byang chub sems la ye nas dag / sems nyid nam mkha' lta bu la //
T02D1342:353b-40: blo bur gzugs brnyan sprin gyis bsgribs //
T02D1342:353b-41: ngo bo ma yin rkyen gyis snang //
T02D1342:353b-42: me dang lcags kyi rang bzhin 'dra //
T02D1342:353b-43: rang bzhin bral ba ma yin te //
T02D1342:353b-44: dus gsum ma yin nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D1342:353b-45: chos sku rang bzhin ye nas dag / longs spyod rang gi bde ba nyid //
T02D1342:353b-46: sprul pa chu zla lta bur snang //
T02D1342:353b-47: dbyer med rig pa gcig gi dang /
T02D1342:354a-0: blang dor gnyis bral mnyam pa @354a * //
T02D1342:354a-2: byang chub sems kyi ye shes la //
T02D1342:354a-3: snying po mnyam nyid yi sangs rgyas //
T02D1342:354a-4: snying po don la rtsol ba med //
T02D1342:354a-5: don gyi rang 'byung gnyis su med //
T02D1342:354a-6: sems kyi rang rig rtog pa nyid //
T02D1342:354a-7: rnam rtog ye shes nyid du 'bar //
T02D1342:354a-8: brtsal med 'bras bu mthar thug nyid //
T02D1342:354a-10: rgya mtsho bzhin du bdud rtsi 'dus //
T02D1342:354a-11: snying po'i don 'di gsang ba'i bcud //
T02D1342:354a-12: gsal ba'i sgron ma snying po 'di //
T02D1342:354a-14: snying po gsung gis rtogs bya ba //
T02D1342:354a-15: sems nyid rang 'byung snying po nyid //
T02D1342:354a-18: rang 'byung rdzogs pa'i dgongs par gnas //
T02D1342:354a-19: ye shes snying po mkha' 'dra ba //
T02D1342:354a-20: mtha' dbus mi mnga' blang dor med //
T02D1342:354a-21: mi len snying po bdag med gsal //
T02D1342:354a-23: rang bzhin snying po sman chen rtogs //
T02D1342:354a-24: 'khor ba'i zug rngu 'byin pa'i mchog / byang chub sems kyi sman med na //
T02D1342:354a-25: rtsol ba'i 'jug pa mtho ris rgyu //
T02D1342:354a-26: sman chen rang la gnas bzhin du //
T02D1342:354a-27: mi rtog gzhan nas tshol bar byed //
T02D1342:354a-28: rnyed pas rang sems sman du mthong //
T02D1342:354a-29: rtogs pas gzhan nas ma 'ongs te //
T02D1342:354a-30: rang 'byung snying po thog ma med //
T02D1342:354a-31: spros bral nam mkha' lta bur gnas //
T02D1342:354a-32: rgyal ba'i sku dang rang bzhin ldan //
T02D1342:354a-33: gzung 'dzin bral ba'i dang la bzhugs //
T02D1342:354a-34: bde ba'i don la ma chags rol //
T02D1342:354a-35: snang ba ye shes rig par gnas //
T02D1342:354a-36: byang chub sems kyi sman chen 'di //
T02D1342:354a-37: ye shes rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ste //
T02D1342:354a-38: dus gsum sangs rgyas lam du bde //
T02D1342:354a-39: bsam gyis mi khyab dgongs pa ni //
T02D1342:354a-40: shes pa rang gzhag so ma nyid //
T02D1342:354a-41: snying po don rtogs bya ba bral //
T02D1342:354a-42: rang gsal rig pa'i ngang la bzhugs //
T02D1342:354a-44: byang chub rgyu ba snying po bral //
T02D1342:354a-46: thugs rje rang 'byung ye shes nyid //
T02D1342:354a-47: rtsol bral rang snang byin rlabs 'byung //
T02D1342:354a-48: phyogs ris mi mnga' kun la khyab //
T02D1342:354a-49: snying po nyid du kun sgrol mdzad //
T02D1342:354a-50: byams pa chos nyid ngang du skyabs //
T02D1342:354a-51: dga' ba rang rig mi 'bral ba //
T02D1342:354a-52: blang dor gnyis med pa btod snyoms che //
T02D1342:354b-1: rtogs bral 'khor ba rang bzhin dag / thugs rjes sems can don mi mdzad //
T02D1342:354b-2: dngos po mi mnga' rang 'byung sems //
T02D1342:354b-4: rin chen gsung gis brtags pas shes //
T02D1342:354b-5: 'gro drug sems can thams cad la //
T02D1342:354b-6: rang gnas ye shes nyid ldan pa //
T02D1342:354b-7: brtags pa gsum gyis shes par 'gyur //
T02D1342:354b-8: ming dang sems la ye shes tshol //
T02D1342:354b-9: dngos po gang yang rung ba la //
T02D1342:354b-10: brtags pas rang log shes par 'byung //
T02D1342:354b-11: yid bzhin rin chen nor bu bzhin //
T02D1342:354b-12: 'rgyur [*'gyur] ba med pa'i gnas lugs dang //
T02D1342:354b-13: thun mong dam tshig gsum ldan pa'o //
T02D1342:354b-14: lce mnan nang yig sgra la sogs //
T02D1342:354b-15: de bzhin gnas skabs gzhan du yang //
T02D1342:354b-16: snying po ye shes gzung bar bya //
T02D1342:354b-18: skal ldan rin chen lta bu yis //
T02D1342:354b-19: grub mtha' ngan la gnas dus su //
T02D1342:354b-20: 'di yis don kun rig par gyis //
T02D1342:354b-21: 'di yis rang sems ma rig na //
T02D1342:354b-22: sgra'am tshad ma gang gis kyang //
T02D1342:354b-23: rig pa'i ye shes rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D1342:354b-25: rtog pa rang 'byung sems kyi lam //
T02D1342:354b-26: ma yengs byang chub sems su gsal //
T02D1342:354b-28: 'gro don mdzad la rtog pa grol //
T02D1342:354b-29: 'od gsal dbyer med gcig gi ngang //
T02D1342:354b-30: byang chub sems kyi rang rig 'di //
T02D1342:354b-31: bag chags 'khrul pa'i dbang gis na //
T02D1342:354b-32: brtags pas sna tshogs med bzhin grub //
T02D1342:354b-33: sems kyi bag chags phyir snang yang //
T02D1342:354b-35: sna tshogs snang ba'i rang bzhin 'di //
T02D1342:354b-36: snying po gsung gis brjod bya ste //
T02D1342:354b-37: 'khrul pa ma yin log snang bas //
T02D1342:354b-38: rang rig byang chub sems su brjod //
T02D1342:354b-39: rtog pa'i rtsa ba byang chub sems //
T02D1342:354b-40: rang rig sems la rtog par 'khrul //
T02D1342:354b-41: thog ma med dus bag chags dang //
T02D1342:354b-42: rin chen gdams ngag rkyen med pas //
T02D1342:354b-43: rtog med snying po sems ma goms //
T02D1342:354b-44: thag pa sprul min snang ba bzhin //
T02D1342:354b-45: lus ngag sems dbyen sgyu ma'i lus //
T02D1342:354b-46: sna tshogs snang ba'i rang bzhin 'di //
T02D1342:354b-47: chos nyid yin par dbyer med pas //
T02D1342:354b-48: zung du 'jug pa gang dgongs pa //
T02D1342:354b-49: gsal ba'i sems de nyid la ni //
T02D1342:355a-0: chos nyid ma yin bag mi @355a * //
T02D1342:355a-2: thams cad snang ba'i ngo bo 'di //
T02D1342:355a-3: ye shes snying po nyid du mthong //
T02D1342:355a-4: ngo bo nyid la brjod pa bral //
T02D1342:355a-5: rang bzhin rnam dag rig pa la //
T02D1342:355a-6: brjod med don du ma brjod na //
T02D1342:355a-7: rig pa'i don la mjal ba med //
T02D1342:355a-8: brjod pa'i sbra la sems drangs pas //
T02D1342:355a-9: ma bcos rang 'byung chos nyid mthong //
T02D1342:355a-10: rang rig sems la don rtogs nas //
T02D1342:355a-11: 'jug thabs mi gnyis tshul gyis gnas //
T02D1342:355a-12: cig car rdzogs pa bde ba che //
T02D1342:355a-13: phyogs su ma lhung gzung ba'i sems //
T02D1342:355a-14: rdzogs pa'i ye shes snying po la //
T02D1342:355a-15: rim pa'i lam med mthar phyin nas //
T02D1342:355a-17: de nyid snying po don ldan pas //
T02D1342:355a-18: 'dod pa'i tshogs la yid mi 'jug / de bzhin
T02D1342:355a-19: pha rol phyin pa drug / rang 'byung rdzogs pa'i
T02D1342:355a-20: sems la gnas // bsam bral mi rtog dgongs pa la //
T02D1342:355a-21: de nyid pha rol phyin drug ldan //
T02D1342:355a-22: mi rtog 'dzin med tshul la gnas //
T02D1342:355a-23: ma yengs rig pa rgyun mi 'chad //
T02D1342:355a-24: dmigs med shes pa pha rol phyin //
T02D1342:355a-25: sems nyid stong pa'i dngos med la //
T02D1342:355a-26: chos dang chos can mi gnas pas //
T02D1342:355a-27: dbyer med bden pa bzhi po don //
T02D1342:355a-28: dngos po ye shes 'gags ma yin //
T02D1342:355a-29: bden brdzun nyid kyi mthar mi 'dzin //
T02D1342:355a-30: snying po'i don la 'dod pa bral //
T02D1342:355a-31: kun bzang ye shes 'od gsal la //
T02D1342:355a-32: bsam bral ye shes nam mkha' 'dra //
T02D1342:355a-33: rdzogs pa ye shes ma bcos pa //
T02D1342:355a-34: mi 'gyur chos nyid dbyings kyi thugs //
T02D1342:355a-35: mi 'gag ye shes rig pa'i gsung //
T02D1342:355a-36: dbyer med chos sku gzung 'dzin bral //
T02D1342:355a-37: sku gsung thugs bral sku gsung thugs //
T02D1342:355a-38: phyi nang mi mnga' rang gsal nyid //
T02D1342:355a-40: dbang po ngo la snang ba'i rnams //
T02D1342:355a-41: chos nyid byang chub sems su mthong //
T02D1342:355a-42: nyon mongs lnga po ye shes lam //
T02D1342:355a-43: thams cad byang chub sems kyi gzhi //
T02D1342:355a-44: sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin //
T02D1342:355a-45: dag pa'i sems la brtsal med de //
T02D1342:355a-46: brtsal ba'i kun rdzob grub ma yin //
T02D1342:355a-47: dam pa'i don la gang 'jug pas //
T02D1342:355a-48: gsang ba rdzogs pa'i don nyid la //
T02D1342:355a-49: chos nyid gsang ba 'di dmigs na //
T02D1342:355a-50: nges pa'i gdams ngag zab mo yis //
T02D1342:355a-51: brtsal med rang gzhag brtsal ba dang //
T02D1342:355a-52: mi bsgom rang lugs bsgom pa /
T02D1342:355b-1: mi gnas tshul la 'dug pa dang //
T02D1342:355b-2: gzhag med mnyam gzhag rang 'byung ba de //
T02D1342:355b-3: mi rtog don la gyi na ba //
T02D1342:355b-4: dge mi dge yi rnam rtog bral //
T02D1342:355b-5: byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1342:355b-6: rang 'byung byang chub brtsal ba min //
T02D1342:355b-7: byang chub 'dod la byang chub sems //
T02D1342:355b-8: yang dag don gyi snying po 'di //
T02D1342:355b-9: btsal bas rnyed par mi 'gyur te //
T02D1342:355b-11: nyal ba'i bsam gtan 'khor lo bde //
T02D1342:355b-12: ma lus byang chub sems kyi dang //
T02D1342:355b-13: chos nyid byang chub mnyam gzhag na //
T02D1342:355b-14: dngos med byang chub rang 'byung dang //
T02D1342:355b-15: 'dus ma byas pas bde ba'i klong //
T02D1342:355b-16: sems nyid bsam med brjod las 'das //
T02D1342:355b-17: ye nas rnam dag bsam du med //
T02D1342:355b-18: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor rig pa yis //
T02D1342:355b-19: de la ma brtsal gnas na bsgoms //
T02D1342:355b-20: rig pa dbyings la yan bzhag na //
T02D1342:355b-21: brtsal ba'i nad bral bsgom pa yin //
T02D1342:355b-22: bde bas snying po dri ma med //
T02D1342:355b-23: rig pa 'od gsal nyid du bsgom //
T02D1342:355b-24: 'od gsal sems la gnas gyur na //
T02D1342:355b-25: rnam rtag mtshan ma rang bzhin zhi //
T02D1342:355b-26: skye ba med pa'i phyag rgya yis //
T02D1342:355b-27: rang snang kun bzang rol pa 'grub //
T02D1342:355b-28: dngos med dngos la mi dmigs shing //
T02D1342:355b-29: dbu ma'i sems bral rgyu ba bral //
T02D1342:355b-30: sems kyi rgyu ba med pas na //
T02D1342:355b-31: thams cad rang 'byung stong pa nyid //
T02D1342:355b-32: sems nyid rig pa rang 'byung ba //
T02D1342:355b-33: 'gyur med skyod med gsal bas na //
T02D1342:355b-34: yi ge med pa'i snying po gsung //
T02D1342:355b-35: dam pa byang chub sems la gnas //
T02D1342:355b-36: rgyal po'i dam tshig ma bcos pa //
T02D1342:355b-37: bsrung ba med pa'i tshul gyis bsrung //
T02D1342:355b-38: 'gyur ba med pa'i phyag rgya la //
T02D1342:355b-40: mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D1342:355b-42: bsam bral rang bzhin rgyal ba'i thugs //
T02D1342:355b-43: byang chub sems la 'da' ba med //
T02D1342:355b-44: sa 'dzin rnam pa'i sems bzhin du /
T02D1342:355b-45: gzhan nas rnyed par mi 'gyur te //
T02D1342:355b-46: brtags na rang sems nyid la thug //
T02D1342:355b-47: gzhi la rang gzhag gzhan 'dod bral //
T02D1342:355b-48: rang sems rig pa 'gyur ba med //
T02D1342:355b-49: ji bzhin mi rtog chos kyi sku //
T02D1342:355b-50: bya bral lhun grub ji bzhin gnas //
T02D1342:356a-0: rang 'byung 'od gsal ye nas dag / cir yang mi dgongs @356a * //
T02D1342:356a-2: shes rab snying rje ldan pas 'grub //
T02D1342:356a-3: snying po byang chub rang bzhin la //
T02D1342:356a-4: bsam med rang gzhag thugs su bde //
T02D1342:356a-5: 'khor lo'am rig pa bde ba yis //
T02D1342:356a-6: rang gnas rig pa tshol ba nyid //
T02D1342:356a-7: rnam rtog yin te don la med //
T02D1342:356a-8: blon rigs gsum las dmangs kyi yang //
T02D1342:356a-9: chags pa'i 'du shes drang ba'i don //
T02D1342:356a-10: nges par spros bral rang 'byung sems //
T02D1342:356a-11: chags pa'i lam gyis shes mi 'gyur //
T02D1342:356a-12: blang dor med pa'i brtul zhugs kyang //
T02D1342:356a-13: nges par brtags na blang dor nyid //
T02D1342:356a-14: rang rig bsam bral gzhag pa ste //
T02D1342:356a-15: don dngos 'dzin pa zhen par gnas //
T02D1342:356a-17: mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin pas //
T02D1342:356a-18: shes rab thabs kyi chags pa bral //
T02D1342:356a-19: thig le 'dod rtsol spro bsdu med //
T02D1342:356a-20: rang rig rtsol bral bde ba'i gnas //
T02D1342:356a-21: shes rab thabs la snyoms 'jug pas //
T02D1342:356a-22: bde ba'i bsam gtan chen po yin //
T02D1342:356a-23: sgyu ma'i ro la ma chags pas //
T02D1342:356a-24: chags med ye shes rdzogs pa'i lam //
T02D1342:356a-25: byang chub sems kyi rang gsal 'di //
T02D1342:356a-26: dngos med shes rab thabs kyis 'grub //
T02D1342:356a-28: ngo bo ma grub me shel 'dra //
T02D1342:356a-29: dngos med ye shes mthong ba grol //
T02D1342:356a-30: gzugs sogs snang ba brtags pa yin //
T02D1342:356a-31: dngos po rang gzhan thams cad ni //
T02D1342:356a-32: chos nyid dbyings kyi thig le yin //
T02D1342:356a-33: de nyid sgrub pa'i thabs su ni //
T02D1342:356a-34: snying po rig pa nyid shar bas //
T02D1342:356a-35: mtha' yi mun pa ngang gis dag / sgrub med rang 'byung sgrub pa 'dis //
T02D1342:356a-36: khams gsum 'od gsal thugs su sgrub //
T02D1342:356a-37: rang sems rig pa'i spyod pa bde //
T02D1342:356a-38: ye shes spyod pa rang gzhag nyid //
T02D1342:356a-40: thugs rje tshogs kyi bsod nams 'dir //
T02D1342:356a-41: rang 'byung rig pa rtogs gyur nas //
T02D1342:356a-42: 'gro ba drang phyir rgyun mi bcad //
T02D1342:356a-43: snying po sems kyi don rig na //
T02D1342:356a-44: ye shes mthar phyin 'bras bur gnas //
T02D1342:356a-45: mtshan dang dpe byad rang bzhin grub //
T02D1342:356a-47: chu gsal ri bong can bzhin no //
T02D1342:356a-48: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1342:356a-49: me shel gzugs ltar 'gro ba sgrol //
T02D1342:356a-50: ye shes rang byung de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1342:356b-0: yan lag mi mnga' rtsis las @356b 'das //
T02D1342:356b-1: mthar phyin dga' ba rig par gsal //
T02D1342:356b-2: dgongs pa rang gzhag ye sangs rgyas //
T02D1342:356b-3: rig pa rang gsal chos rnams la //
T02D1342:356b-4: gang yang bsam du med par gnas //
T02D1342:356b-5: de ltar byang chub sems nyid la //
T02D1342:356b-6: ma rig med pas 'khor ba med //
T02D1342:356b-7: sems can skye ba'i rgyu ma gnas //
T02D1342:356b-8: rang 'byung sems la rtag par gzhug / srid pa'i chos la rgyu med pas //
T02D1342:356b-9: mya ngan 'das pa'i lam dang bral //
T02D1342:356b-10: ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la //
T02D1342:356b-11: nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur te //
T02D1342:356b-12: sangs rgyas sems can rang bzhin gcig / sems kyi ye shes gsang ba 'di //
T02D1342:356b-13: snying po don las rmad du byung //
T02D1342:356b-14: rang 'byung che ba bdag nyid sku //
T02D1342:356b-15: rang rig bde ba rdzogs pa che //
T02D1342:356b-16: thugs rje snang ba sprul pa'i sku //
T02D1342:356b-17: ngo bo ma grub gsang ba'i sems //
T02D1342:356b-18: snang dang mi snad dbyer med do //
T02D1342:356b-19: yod dang med pa byang chub sems //
T02D1342:356b-20: snang ba rang rig tha dad pa //
T02D1342:356b-21: don dang rtags la sogs pa'i rnams //
T02D1342:356b-22: rnam pa tha dad bag chags snang //
T02D1342:356b-23: yang dag ma yin 'khrul pa'i sems //
T02D1342:356b-24: bsam pa'i dbang gis der 'gyur ro //
T02D1342:356b-25: bde gshegs ye shes gsang ba de //
T02D1342:356b-26: ma mthong rnam rtog spros 'chal pas //
T02D1342:356b-27: stong nyid rig pa'i man ngag yin //
T02D1342:356b-28: dran rtog rlung gi rgyu ba bral //
T02D1342:356b-29: mtha' ru ma skyes bsam gtan bya //
T02D1342:356b-30: chos dang chos nyid gang yang min //
T02D1342:356b-31: nam mkha' lta bu bdag med pa //
T02D1342:356b-32: ye shes stong pa'i ngo ba'o //
T02D1342:356b-33: rang bzhin stong pa mtshan ma med //
T02D1342:356b-34: rnam thar gsum ldan bde ba che //
T02D1342:356b-35: chags med gzhi yi lam nas 'jug / mtshan med ngang la gnas pa na //
T02D1342:356b-37: yon tan nam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam //
T02D1342:356b-38: rang gi ye shes snang ba la //
T02D1342:356b-40: rgyun gyi 'khor lo sku yi dang //
T02D1342:356b-41: chags bral dag pa rig pa'i rgyan //
T02D1342:356b-42: rang rig gsal ba ting 'dzin nyid //
T02D1342:356b-43: mi zad 'khor lo bsam du med //
T02D1342:356b-44: sgro bral stong nyid zhi gnas la //
T02D1342:356b-46: mtshan med zhi gnas lhag mthong 'brel //
T02D1342:356b-47: mos 'jug lam la gang gnas nas //
T02D1342:356b-48: mi rtog gsal ba'i don gyis go //
T02D1342:356b-49: bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes ni //
T02D1342:357a-1: rtog pas 'jug / thabs bral rig pa rtsol bas tshol //
T02D1342:357a-2: ra gan gser 'dod de bzhin no //
T02D1342:357a-3: 'dod pa'i sems dang ma bral na //
T02D1342:357a-4: snying po don la bdag 'dzin byed //
T02D1342:357a-5: bde ba'i sems la re ba na //
T02D1342:357a-6: rtog pa'i rjes 'jug zhi gnas yin //
T02D1342:357a-7: rang lus sems sum rtogs par //
T02D1342:357a-9: lus kyi dben pas chos nyid tshol //
T02D1342:357a-10: rang lus sems su shes pas na //
T02D1342:357a-11: gang na gnas kyang sems nyid dben //
T02D1342:357a-12: snang srid sems su shes pas na //
T02D1342:357a-13: dbang po yan lag ye shes gsal //
T02D1342:357a-14: snying po don gyi rang bzhin la //
T02D1342:357a-15: ci yang mi bsgom gang yang min //
T02D1342:357a-16: khyu mchog sems ltar ma bcos pa //
T02D1342:357a-17: rang gzhag rig pa'i 'khor lo nyid //
T02D1342:357a-18: dus gsum du yang btang gzhag med //
T02D1342:357a-19: gang yang mi 'dzin dgag pa med //
T02D1342:357a-20: snying po don gyi rang bzhin la //
T02D1342:357a-21: skyon dang yon tan gnyis med pas //
T02D1342:357a-22: rdzogs pa'i lta ba blang dor med //
T02D1342:357a-24: 'od gsal rgyal ba'i sems nyid yin //
T02D1342:357a-25: rang 'byung thugs kyis ma bcos pa //
T02D1342:357a-26: rnam dag rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs //
T02D1342:357a-27: brtsal med snying po don las 'byung //
T02D1342:357a-28: byang chub sems kyi don nyid la //
T02D1342:357a-29: nges pa'i theg gcig snying po'i don //
T02D1342:357a-30: phyag rgya rim bzhi sbyor ba drug / bsam pa'i theg pa sna tshogs pa //
T02D1342:357a-31: drang ba nyid 'gyur nges pa min //
T02D1342:357a-32: ngo bo nyid la mthon dman med //
T02D1342:357a-33: mos 'jug bsam pa'i rtog par zad //
T02D1342:357a-34: sems nyid nyag gcig phyogs bral ba //
T02D1342:357a-35: du ma'i 'bras med lam du min //
T02D1342:357a-36: ma bcos rnal 'byor rdzogs pa'i lam //
T02D1342:357a-37: mi gnas rang bzhin sems su gcig / ma bgrod mthar phyin 'bras bu'am //
T02D1342:357a-38: rgyu rkyen bral ba skye 'jig med //
T02D1342:357a-39: gdod nas rang 'byung snying por gsal //
T02D1342:357a-40: rig drug ji ltar snang ba dang //
T02D1342:357a-41: mya ngan 'das pa'i rang bzhin la //
T02D1342:357a-42: dbyer med rang 'byung sems su gcig / ris drug sems kyi rtog pa dang //
T02D1342:357a-43: ye shes rang gsal rig pa nyid //
T02D1342:357a-44: khyad par med de snying por gcig / khams gsum 'khor ba snang ba dang //
T02D1342:357a-45: mya ngan 'das pa'i ye shes nyid //
T02D1342:357a-46: rtogs ma rtogs kyis gnyis su byung //
T02D1342:357b-0: rtogs pas @357b rang sems nyid la thugs //
T02D1342:357b-1: gzhan 'dod re ba rtsol ba bral //
T02D1342:357b-2: rang sems rnam dag ye sangs rgyas //
T02D1342:357b-3: kun bzang rgyal ba'i sems nyid bde //
T02D1342:357b-4: mtha' yas 'gro ba thams cad la //
T02D1342:357b-5: rgyal ba'i ye shes rang chas ldan //
T02D1342:357b-6: bsam bral rang lugs cir mi dgongs //
T02D1342:357b-7: ye shes nam mkha'i mkha' dang mnyam //
T02D1342:357b-8: yid la mi byed bya ba btang //
T02D1342:357b-10: rnam pa phra rags cir snang yang //
T02D1342:357b-11: rang gzhag bsam bral nyid du bde //
T02D1342:357b-12: chu yi snang ba de bzhin du //
T02D1342:357b-13: phra rags rnam rtog ye shes nyid //
T02D1342:357b-14: rang rig gnyug ma padma ltar //
T02D1342:357b-15: 'khor bar gnas kyang gdod nas dag / mtshan ma'i rnam pa ci 'byung yang //
T02D1342:357b-16: chu shing lta bur snying po med //
T02D1342:357b-18: rig pa mar me lta bur gsal //
T02D1342:357b-19: rnam par rtog pa cir 'gyur yang //
T02D1342:357b-20: rang rig gnyug ma'i rgyun mi bcad //
T02D1342:357b-21: nam langs sems dang nub kha bzhin //
T02D1342:357b-22: ye shes don gsal de bzhin no //
T02D1342:357b-23: ma bsgrubs rang gsal ngang gis 'byung //
T02D1342:357b-24: skal ldan ma bcos rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1342:357b-25: sems nyid steng kha ltar gnas na //
T02D1342:357b-26: lus ngag rtsol ba ngang gis zhi //
T02D1342:357b-27: bde ba'i ye shes mi rtog pa //
T02D1342:357b-28: shes rab gsal ba'i snying por phyin //
T02D1342:357b-29: mthar phyin rang 'byung mi rtog pa //
T02D1342:357b-30: dri med rgyal ba'i ye shes gsal //
T02D1342:357b-31: rang gnas 'gro ba yongs la khyab //
T02D1342:357b-32: nam mkha' lta bur dbyer med pa //
T02D1342:357b-33: 'gro ba'i sems las gzhan la med //
T02D1342:357b-34: rtog med ngang la rang shar ba'i //
T02D1342:357b-35: rig pa bde ba'i mtshan nyid can //
T02D1342:357b-36: 'dzin pa dag byed ye shes ni //
T02D1342:357b-37: ma bcos ngang gis rang rig gsal //
T02D1342:357b-38: ye shes thig le'i don 'di ni //
T02D1342:357b-39: shes rab gsal bas bdag la bstan //
T02D1342:357b-40: bde ba'i rang rig rtog pa bral //
T02D1342:357b-41: rang gnas ye shes 'od gsal sems //
T02D1342:357b-42: mthong bas the tshom rgyu ba bral //
T02D1342:357b-43: ye shes ngang gnas sgrib pa med //
T02D1342:357b-44: thams cad ye shes gsal mthong bas //
T02D1342:357b-45: snying po don la gos pa med //
T02D1342:357b-47: rtsol bral rang 'byung ye shes yin //
T02D1342:357b-48: rang 'byung ye shes kun gyi bdag / lus dang bral ba yan lag med //
T02D1342:357b-49: sgro skur bral ba'i dngos gzhi can //
T02D1342:357b-50: snying po kun bral kun gyi bdag / ma bcos rig pa'i ting 'dzin gsal //
T02D1342:357b-51: bya ba med bzhin don kun rdzogs /
T02D1342:358a-0: @358a * // rang 'byung gnyug ma kun gyi gzhi //
T02D1342:358a-1: bgrod med rnal 'byor lhun grub lam //
T02D1342:358a-2: ji bzhin kun rdzogs 'bras bu nyid //
T02D1342:358a-3: thig le dbyer med gcig gi ngang //
T02D1342:358a-4: sems nyid bya bral rdzogs pa'i gter //
T02D1342:358a-5: bde ba'i ye shes mi rtog thugs //
T02D1342:358a-6: skal ldan dang po nyid nas rdzogs //
T02D1342:358a-8: rgyal ba'i ye shes mya ngan 'das //
T02D1342:358a-9: bde chen rig pa gcig gi ngang //
T02D1342:358a-10: rang 'byung ji bzhin ma bcos pa //
T02D1342:358a-11: lhun rdzogs spros pa med pa'i ngang //
T02D1342:358a-12: bsam du med pa'i ye shes 'di //
T02D1342:358a-13: rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu ba bral //
T02D1342:358a-14: dus gsum mi mnga' rgyun mi 'chad //
T02D1342:358a-15: sems nyid grub pa'i lam mchog 'di //
T02D1342:358a-16: dbyer med kun la ldan bzhin du //
T02D1342:358a-18: sdug bsngal rtsol ba'i nad kyis gdungs //
T02D1342:358a-19: des na snying po sgron ma 'di //
T02D1342:358a-20: phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams don du //
T02D1342:358a-21: bla ma 'phags pa'i byin rlabs dang //
T02D1342:358a-22: mos pa'i mthu ldan bdag gis rtogs //
T02D1342:358a-23: snying rjes kun bslang yongs la bsngo //
T02D1342:358a-24: snying po de kho na nyid kyi sgrub thabs /
T02D1342:358a-25: yang dag pa'i sa la gnas pa /
T02D1342:358a-26: slob dpon na ro pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1342:358a-28: // / rgya gar gyi pandi ta badzra gu na bha
T02D1342:358a-29: dra dang lo ts'a ba rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis
